text: at night
the sea is largely unguarded this boat
full of Syrian families takes its chance
and makes it from Turkey hello from the
BBC hello you're in Europe hello how are
you I'm fine now good now awfully dull
I'm a human being now and then this side
with the killman's - all other people we
are not people here here we are people
here I'll have alright I'll have
everything there's no one to welcome
them but no one to stop them either
this Greek police [ __ ] leads them alone
during the day here
migrants crowd outside the local police
station this is a crucial list for these
migrants if their names are on the
pieces of paper posted here they will be
able to get their papers and they'll
then be able to leave this island and go
on to the rest of Greece why don't you
stay in your country and fight the woman
in the white top shouts in disgust what
did you expect
I expect that I heard about Europeans
are they are attacked they have hearts
but when I see this I thought they
actually don't have hearts this summer
cost finds itself housing two sets of
visitors migrants and tourists they live
on different worlds in the same Island
hundreds of migrants sleep in the
abandoned captain Elias hotel without
electricity the heat and the mix of
nationalities make this a difficult
refuge the Ordos crystal phyllis is a
physics teacher from course he leads a
small team of volunteers helping the
migrants they're friends of mine
actually everybody feel like one I look
like a friendly with my friends
nice good night he's a nice man
everybody everybody feei everybody feel
very nice this island may be built for
visitors but it's uninvited migrants
struggle to find a home they stay beyond
a welcome they never had James Reynolds
BBC news costs
